title: Elon Owns Twitter + Apple’s Developer Tax + Meta’s Dismal Earning Report
description: The world’s richest man just closed the deal, promising that the company won’t become a ‘hellscape’, appointing himself ‘Chief Twit’ and promptly firing top executives.
dc:creator: Kevin Roose, Casey Newton, Davis Land, Paula Szuchman, Corey Schreppel, Dan Powell, Marion Lozano and Elisheba Ittoop
media:credit: Photo Illustration: The New York Times; Photo: Jim Wilson/The New York Times
